data.title: Kelly McGillis Biography
data.meta_description: Read all about Kelly McGillis with TV Guide's exclusive biography including their list of awards, celeb facts and more at TV Guide.
data.text:
Fast Facts

Dropped out of high school her senior year to pursue acting

Breakthrough role was a soft-spoken Amish widow opposite Harrison Ford's detective in Witness (1985)

Best known for playing Tom Cruise's love interest, Charlotte Blackwood, in the 1986 smash Top Gun

Garnered critical acclaim for her performance as a sex-crimes prosecutor in the 1988 crime drama The Accused; she said her performance was inspired by her own rape in 1982

Made her Broadway debut in 1994, starring in the Roundabout Theatre Company's production of Hedda Gabler

Played Mrs

Robinson in the 2004 national touring company of The Graduate

Mother, Joan, runs the Key West Theatre Festival
